reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 588/00: PRINCIPLES AND STANDARDS RELATING TO RESTRUCTURING PROPOSALS
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRINCIPLES AND STANDARDS RELATING TO RESTRUCTURING PROPOSALS

content.content: 1. No restructuring is permitted if the municipality that would exist after the restructuring would consist of two or more parts that are not contiguous. O. Reg. 588/00, s. 1. Français
content.raw_html:
1. No restructuring is permitted if the municipality that would exist after the restructuring would consist of two or more parts that are not contiguous. O. Reg. 588/00, s. 1.

Français
